main event: Three objects were observed in flight over Akron, Ohio on August 5-6, 1963.
interesting points: The objects were seen moving from east to west at a very fast speed, fading in the distance.
One object was observed moving from north to west, and a group of three objects later disappeared over the eastern horizon.
The objects appeared as bright lights, the size of coffee cups, and made a right turn to the west.
The objects were visible for less than 1 minute (about 15 seconds).
The witness was unable to provide detailed descriptions due to the rapid motion of the objects.
sighted object: three bright lights in the sky
